org.identityconnectors.dbcommon

Class DatabaseFilterTranslator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.identityconnectors.framework.common.objects.filter.AbstractFilterTranslator<FilterWhereBuilder>
      • org.identityconnectors.dbcommon.DatabaseFilterTranslator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FilterTranslator<FilterWhereBuilder>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DatabaseTableFilterTranslator

    public abstract class DatabaseFilterTranslator
extends AbstractFilterTranslator<FilterWhereBuilder>
    DatabaseFilterTranslator abstract class translate filters to database WHERE clause The resource specific getAttributeName must be provided in real translator.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Detail

      • createBuilder

        protected FilterWhereBuilder createBuilder()
        Returns:

      • createAndExpression

        protected FilterWhereBuilder createAndExpression(FilterWhereBuilder leftExpression,
                                                 FilterWhereBuilder rightExpression)
        Description copied from class: AbstractFilterTranslator
        Should be overridden by subclasses to create an AND expression if the native resource supports AND.
        Overrides:
        createAndExpression in class AbstractFilterTranslator<FilterWhereBuilder>
        Parameters:
        leftExpression - The left expression. Will never be null.
        rightExpression - The right expression. Will never be null.
        Returns:
        The AND expression. A return value of null means a native AND query cannot be created for the given expressions. In this case, the resulting query will consist of the leftExpression only.

      • createOrExpression

        protected FilterWhereBuilder createOrExpression(FilterWhereBuilder leftExpression,
                                                FilterWhereBuilder rightExpression)
        Description copied from class: AbstractFilterTranslator
        Should be overridden by subclasses to create an OR expression if the native resource supports OR.
        Overrides:
        createOrExpression in class AbstractFilterTranslator<FilterWhereBuilder>
        Parameters:
        leftExpression - The left expression. Will never be null.
        rightExpression - The right expression. Will never be null.
        Returns:
        The OR expression. A return value of null means a native OR query cannot be created for the given expressions. In this case, AbstractFilterTranslator.translate(org.identityconnectors.framework.common.objects.filter.Filter) may return multiple queries, each of which must be run and results combined.

      • createEqualsExpression

        protected FilterWhereBuilder createEqualsExpression(EqualsFilter filter,
                                                    boolean not)
        Description copied from class: AbstractFilterTranslator
        Should be overridden by subclasses to create a EQUALS expression if the native resource supports EQUALS.
        Overrides:
        createEqualsExpression in class AbstractFilterTranslator<FilterWhereBuilder>
        Parameters:
        filter - The contains filter. Will never be null.
        not - True if this should be a NOT EQUALS
        Returns:
        The EQUALS expression. A return value of null means a native EQUALS query cannot be created for the given filter. In this case, AbstractFilterTranslator.translate(org.identityconnectors.framework.common.objects.filter.Filter) may return an empty query set, meaning fetch everything. The filter will be re-applied in memory to the resulting object stream. This does not scale well, so if possible, you should implement this method.

      • createContainsExpression

        protected FilterWhereBuilder createContainsExpression(ContainsFilter filter,
                                                      boolean not)
        Description copied from class: AbstractFilterTranslator
        Should be overridden by subclasses to create a CONTAINS expression if the native resource supports CONTAINS.
        Overrides:
        createContainsExpression in class AbstractFilterTranslator<FilterWhereBuilder>
        Parameters:
        filter - The contains filter. Will never be null.
        not - True if this should be a NOT CONTAINS
        Returns:
        The CONTAINS expression. A return value of null means a native CONTAINS query cannot be created for the given filter. In this case, AbstractFilterTranslator.translate(org.identityconnectors.framework.common.objects.filter.Filter) may return an empty query set, meaning fetch everything. The filter will be re-applied in memory to the resulting object stream. This does not scale well, so if possible, you should implement this method.
